title: Well i got it... the dreaded symbol.
body: it now sits there for everyone to see, Taunting the fact that i have been unable to climb out of bronze :(

replies.body:
We all feel your pain @Lord Sesshomaru - 

I am a Platinum Tier player (currently) and Stream every night (OCE)! Feel free to follow my stream at http://www.twitch.tv/thrill3rrrr and I will watch one of your games for you and give you a free guide on what to do in certain situations and it may just open up/blow your mind on the little things that can make a MASSIVE difference if you would like to improve your mechanics and overall awareness.

Feel free to message me on the Stream for any tips & have a good ol chat _b

Regards, Thrill3r
Ugh dude how bad is it? I haven't moved past S5 50lp in like two weeks

Honestly that medal doesn't mean much, cause it marks 100 games in a division, but here's the kicker, it can easily take more then 100 games for some people to climb.

Hell i managed to earn it in silver before i got to gold.
This might ease your disappointment. I have a mate who made gold last year. He's got the medal in silver for this season.
